cs213.photoAlbum.control

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.control.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The Controller class does all data processing in the program except for storage of objects.
    Author:
    Jinhei, jeffkang93

        Adds a new USER
        Parameters:
        name - - full name of the USER
        id - - unique userID of the USER
        Returns:
        true if the USER was successfully created, false if USER is already in use.

        Deletes a USER
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • createAlbum

        public boolean createAlbum(java.lang.String albumName)
        Checks if an album with name albumName already exists in the USER's album list, then adds album if it does not.
        Parameters:
        albumName - - name of album to be added
        Returns:
        true if album was added to the album list, false if album with name albumName already existed in USER's album list.

      • deleteAlbum

        public boolean deleteAlbum(java.lang.String albumName)
        Checks if an album with name albumName already exists in the USER's album list, then removes the album if it does.
        Parameters:
        albumName - - name of album to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if album was removed, false if album did not exist

      • renameAlbum

        public boolean renameAlbum(java.lang.String oldName,
                  java.lang.String newName)
        Checks if an album with name oldName already exists in the USER's album list, then renames the album to newName if it does.
        Parameters:
        oldName - - name of the album to be renamed
        newName - - new name of renamed album
        Returns:
        true if album was renamed, false if album did not exist

        Returns:
        a list of photo details or null if no photos exist.

        Parameters:
        albumName - - name of the album to be listed
        Returns:
        List of the album's photos. Returns null if the album was not found

      • addPhoto

        public int addPhoto(java.lang.String fileName,
           java.lang.String caption,
           java.lang.String albumName)
        If no photo with name fileName already exists in the album, then it is added with the given caption.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - file name of photo to be added
        caption - - caption for the photo to be added
        albumName - - album name of the photo to be added
        Returns:
        1 if photo was added to album, 0 if photo was previously in album, -1 if specified album does not exist, -2 if photo file does not exist

      • movePhoto

        public int movePhoto(java.lang.String fileName,
            java.lang.String oldAlbumName,
            java.lang.String newAlbumName)
        Moves a photo with name fileName from and old album to its new album.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - name of the photo to be moved
        oldAlbumName - - name of album to be moved from
        newAlbumName - - name of album to be moved to
        Returns:
        1 if photo was moved, 0 if photo did not exist in old album, -1 old album did not exist, -2 new album did not exist, -3 if photo is already in the new album

      • removePhoto

        public int removePhoto(java.lang.String fileName,
              java.lang.String albumName)
        If a photo with name fileName exists in the album, it is removed.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - file name of photo to be removed
        albumName - - album name of the photo to be added
        Returns:
        1 if photo was removed from album, 0 if photo was not previously in album, -1 if album does not exist

      • recaptionPhoto

        public boolean recaptionPhoto(java.lang.String fileName,
                     java.lang.String caption)
        If a photo with name fileName exists in the album, its caption is changed.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - file name of photo to change caption
        caption - - new caption for photo
        Returns:
        true if photo caption was successfully changed, false if no photo with name fileName is in album

      • addTag

        public int addTag(java.lang.String fileName,
         java.lang.String tagType,
         java.lang.String tagValue)
        Adds a unique tag type-value pair to a photo.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - name of the photo to be tagged
        tagType - - type of the tag to be added
        tagValue - - value of the tag to be added
        Returns:
        1 if tag was added to the photo, -1 if photo does not exist, 0 if tag type-value already exists if the tag type-value pair already existed.

      • deleteTag

        public int deleteTag(java.lang.String fileName,
            java.lang.String tagType,
            java.lang.String tagValue)
        Deletes a tag from a photo.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - name of the photo to remove tag
        tagType - - type of the tag to be removed
        tagValue - - value of the tag to be removed
        Returns:
        1 if tag was deleted from photo, 0 if if the tag type-value pair does not exist in the photo -1 if the photo does not exist

      • getPhotosByDate

        public java.util.List<PhotoDetails> getPhotosByDate(java.lang.String start_date,
                                           java.lang.String end_date)
        retrieve all photos taken within a given range of dates, in chronological order
        Parameters:
        start_date - - A string that holds the start date for photos to be retrieved
        end_date - - A String that holds the end date for photos to be retrieved
        Returns:
        - A list of PhotoDetails; returns null if dates are improperly formatted

      • getPhotosByTag

        public java.util.List<PhotoDetails> getPhotosByTag(java.lang.String[] tag)
        retrieves all photos with the given tags in chronological order
        Parameters:
        tag - - A tag type or value
        Returns:
        - A list of PhotoDetails in chronological order. returns null if value field is improperly formatted.

      • getPhotosByTagValue

        Method used by getPhotosByTag for searching only by value
        Parameters:
        value - - A String containing a tag value
        Returns:
        - A list of PhotoDetails of photos containing this tag value

        Parameters:
        type - - A String containing a tag type
        value - - A String containing a tag value
        Returns:
